item.title: Hubway Visualization Challenge
item.description: Visualizing Hubway Data Introduction While browsing around for an exploratory data analysis project, I came across the Hubway Data Visualization Challenge. Hubway is a bicycle rental company that has stations throughout in Boston and the surrounding areas. The competition has already closed but the data was still available through the site. Having lived in Boston for a few years, I decided to play around with the data. Objective In this blog, I will try to document the steps that I took to create my rendering of geospatial visualizations of Hubway’s bicycle data.
